title: A Child's Garden of Grass
content:
Hello Board,  
Anyone out there able to id this font and/or id similar fonts?

Thanks in advance.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [grass.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20121215132743/http:/typophile.com/files/grass.jpg) | 101.12 KB |
author: geoffkaplan

comments.content:
This reminds me of [Macbeth](http://web.archive.org/web/20121215132743/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/macbeth/)/Reuben that has been made a lot more ornate. A very 'Victorian' era look. It has to be a font, but where to find it?

- Mike Yanega
